meanings.definition: A Roman military officer commanding a century of soldiers.
meanings.sent1: The centurions led their soldiers into battle with bravery.
meanings.sent2: The centurions were respected leaders in the Roman army.
meanings.sent3: The centurions organized a fun team-building exercise for the soldiers.
meanings.sent4: The centurions' authority was as strong as the walls of a fortress.
meanings.sent5: The image of the centurions in their armor was etched in the soldiers' minds.

meanings.definition: A leader or commander of a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: The centurions of the company made important decisions together.
meanings.sent2: The centurions of the team motivated everyone to work hard.
meanings.sent3: The centurions planned a surprise party for their colleagues.
meanings.sent4: The centurions' influence spread like wildfire in the organization.
meanings.sent5: The dedication of the centurions inspired loyalty among the members.
